content: Hello, thank you for contacting XYZ Home Services. How can I help you today?
Yeah, I need a plumber. My kitchen sink is leaking again.
Iâ€™m sorry to hear about your sink. Can I get your name to get things started?
Thank you, Frank. Could you please provide your address so we can check if you're within our service area?
It's the house with the old red mailbox, next to the park.
Thank you, Frank. Could you please provide the full address including the street name and number?
That's all I've got. Everybody knows me around here. Just tell the plumber to look for Frank with the red mailbox.
I apologize, but I do need a complete address to continue. Could you please provide your street name and house number?
Look, I'm 86 years old, I don't remember the number. It's the red mailbox. Next to the playground. Can't you just send somebody?
Thank you for your patience, Frank. I'm having trouble confirming your address. I'll get a human team member to help you right away.
reason: Customer cannot provide a full address. Human intervention needed.

content: Hi Frank, this is Angela with XYZ Home Services. I understand you need a plumber and you're next to the park with the red mailbox. Just to be sure, can you confirm the name of the park or any nearby street signs? This will help us get someone to you as quickly as possible.
Sure, it's Maple Park and the street out front is Pine Avenue.
Thanks, Frank! I have enough information now to inform our plumber. We'll look for your red mailbox on Pine Avenue next to Maple Park. Someone will contact you soon to confirm the exact arrival time.
reason: Operator scheduled the appointment successfully with customer-provided location description.
